fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose up to three times to announce the Suicide Hotline. Players who would commit suicide instead do not. They are informed you are the Suicide Hotline. Players who do not commit suicide do not know you are the Suicide Hotline.
- Evil players who kill another player on the night you announce the Suicide Hotline realize the harm they did and cannot kill the following night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Can only roll if a role capable of suicide or causing others suicide exists.
- If no roles capable of suicide exist anymore (excluding yourself) you are informed and commit suicide the following night. You can prevent this.
